properties.description: Drinking fountain and tap attached to the side of the toilets/changing rooms.
Drinking fountain at Tawa Tawa Reserve (Dog Exercise Area) at the Murchsion St entrance carpark.
Drinking fountain at about the half-way mark on the artificial turf.
Drinking fountain beside public toilets at play area.
Drinking fountain between TSB ampitheatre style seats and Water Whirler sculpture.
Drinking Fountain on north side of dug out on Hockey Turf 3 - Mt Albert.
Drinking fountain on the northwest corner of the shrub bed.
Drinking fountain on the front wall of Freyberg Pool, at opposite end from main entrance.
Drinking fountain between the basketball half court and the skate bowl.
Drinking fountain near the pavilion.
Drinking fountain next to fence by Byrd Memorial.
Drinking fountain in northwest of Boat Harbour Park
Drinking fountain on the lagoon side, between Raukura Wharewaka Function Centre and Rowing Club.
Drinking fountain and tap attached to wire mesh fence in northeast corner of track.
Drinking fountain near the toilets.
Drinking fountain at eastern side of Clyde Quay Wharf.
Drinking Fountain located in the southern end of the Cemetery on the south eastern end of the rose garden.
Drinking fountain at the bottom of the ramp entrance to Nairnville Recreation Centre.
Drinking fountain at northern end of Clyde Quay Wharf.
Drinking fountain in Denton Place Park.
Drinking fountain at the northern end of pavilion facing sportsfield, mounted to the wall.
Drinking Fountain on south side of dug out on Hockey Turf 3 - Mt Albert.
Drinking Fountain in front of Mud Cycles at Terawhiti Park.
Drinking fountain on western side of Clyde Quay Wharf.
Drinking fountain in the seating area close to the Mount Cook Police Barracks building.
Drinking fountain at end of main entrance walkway on western end of discovery gardens.
Drinking fountain on brick base located at the entranceway to Lady Norwood's Rose Garden from the car park.
Drinking fountain in the seating area on the south side of Aro Street, just before Holloway Road.
Drinking fountain attached to the tap on the south side of the track near the brick steps.
Drinking fountain near the toilet block.
Drinking fountain on the eastern side of the band rotunda, Oriental Parade.
Drinking fountain beside the wall between Fergs Kayaks and public toilets.
Drinking fountain attached to external wall on lower level grandstand.
Drinking fountain pedestal on the footpath outside Roseneath School, 11 Maida Vale Road.
Drinking fountain behind the seat at the no.8 tee.
Drinking fountain at the very top of Tory Street, near where Tory Street becomes Tasman Street.
Drinking fountain on the road side, near the corner of Courtenay Pl and Tory Street. Has bottle filler on the side.
Drinking fountain at the intersection of Cuba and Ghuznee Streets. Has bottle filler on the side.
Drinking fountain in the park near Karori Road, at the seating area.
Drinking fountain (with dog bowl) at corner of path leading to Peter Fraser's Memorial.
Drinking fountain in the wind garden northwest corner of the park. (Herd Street)
Drinking fountain in play area by swings.
Drinking fountain pedestal, on the apex area at the corner of Featherstone / Hunter / Lambton Quay.
Drinking fountain by the perennial collection outside the Begonia House Cafe.
Drinking fountain in the seating area southwest corner of the park.
Drinking fountain at the main entrance beside the water feature. Has fountain, bottle filler, tap & dog bowl.
Drinking fountain at the Treehouse outside main entrance.
Drinking fountain at the northern end of tug bridge.
Drinking fountain by the toilets, also has a bottle filler and tap.
Drinking fountain located on the walkway between Hockey turf 1 and 2 on the eastern side attached to building.
Drinking fountain in front of the kiosk by the play area.
Drinking fountain on the pavement near Taranaki Street, by the sculpture "Te Moana".
Drinking Fountain between the play area and the library.
Drinking fountain attached to the outside wall of the Information Centre, 0.4m from the northern corner of the building.
Drinking fountain on building opposite Wellington Museum Entrance.
Drinking fountain near the toilets.
Drinking fountain in seating area on the corner of Victoria and Bond Streets.
Refill station located to the west of the pavilion building on the artificial warm-up area.
Drinking fountain near the toilets.
Drinking fountain at the southern end of the play area at Wakefield Park.
Drinking fountain at the northern end of the play area, beside the skate park.
Drinking fountain on roadside of Evans Bay Dog Exercise park.
Drinking fountain in the main foyer opposite reception. Only available during recreation centre opening hours, 8:30am-10pm Mon-Fri, 8:30am-6pm Sat, 12noon-6pm Sun.
Drinking fountain in front of the Community Water Station, beside the fence on the eastern side of the park.
Drinking Fountain on Taranaki Street Wharf, beside the Hikitea and Bascule Bridge.
Drinking fountain in front of the Community Water Station, at the Fitzgerald Place entrance.
